question: <katex>$CH_{3}-C(CH_3)_2-O-CH_{3} + HI \rightarrow A + B$</katex>
A and B respectively are
explanation: The reaction proceeds via <katex>$S_N1$</katex> mechanism because a stable tertiary carbocation can be formed.
The bond breaks to form the tertiary butyl carbocation, which reacts with <katex>$I^-$</katex>.
